title: Cap Crown, 1740–55
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Brussels style
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Cap crown of Point d'Angleterre à Réseau with a pattern of floral and foliated forms forming a frame for a central, stylized bouquet. Fond: Droschel. Modes: venises, portes, fond de neige, gaze quadrillée, St. Esprit avec rangs clairs.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cap Crown, 1740–55.
1740–55. Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Brussels style. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-292.
